name: Collecting Connected Computer Components
description:
In this small puzzle-story game, explore a small town, help citizens, and gain the parts for a PC so that you can participate in the Lost Relic Games Game Jam!

Please play in full screen to get the buttons to work properly! Fixed but can't upload the new game until voting ends :') Same with the ending!

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys - move

Spacebar - interact

Created by:

Staillo Gaming & The Musical Pete

Music by:

The Musical Pete

Created for Lost Relic Games 1st Official Game Jam! One week long game jam made in 4 days!
